about_the_game:
Qisah Tomang: Cycle Ends is a story-rich RPG. The story is set in an East Asia inspired fantasy world. Fight off the Demon Tomang and its minion and discover the truth behind the Cycle of Hatred and put an end to it.

Follow Zemi, a stiff man of ideal, B.W. a reckless carefree warrior, Aiq a vengeful demon hunter, Ani the kindly scholar, Shaoke the senior berserker, and Ina the mysterious lady on their quest to save the empire and uncover the secret behind The Cycle of Hatred. Will they succeed or is it too late to save the empire and its people?

Your decisions through the game will influence the outcome of the game, choose carefully or explore each decision and route to find out what is at the end of the road!

Qisah Tomang: Cycle Ends DEMO will take part in their quest seeking wisdom from the Ancient Sleeping Dragon.

name: Qisah Tomang: Cycle Ends Demo
short_description: Qisah Tomang: Cycle Ends DEMO is a JRPG set in east Asia inspired fantasy theme. Using charge-turn based system and row formation battle system to add depth to the battle.
